body: Hello Avicus! My name is Junior :P. I am 13 years old, I am new to the forums but not new to the server I been here since April 10, 2013. It may say 10 months ago because I use to be skipp18. I was here since Hunger Games was just put in. I seen many things come and go. My favorite Nebula map was Four Corners! Well guys, hope to be playing with you guys!
body_tagged: Hello Avicus! My name is Junior :P. I am 13 years old, I am new to the forums but not new to the server I been here since April 10, 2013. It may say 10 months ago because I use to be skipp18. I was here since Hunger Games was just put in. I seen many things come and go. My favorite Nebula map was Four Corners! Well guys, hope to be playing with you guys!

replies.body: Hey I haven't seen this thread in 6 months! Lol it's been fading into the darkness. Sorry for bumping this up, but anyways thank you for a warm welcoming guys! I just bought Diamond this past weekend and I am enjoying it a lot <3. Also, if there is forum rules, can you please link me it, I would highly appreciate it, Thanks!
